name: Super Hacker Girl
description:
You were out of the game, Super Hacker Girl....

....but the game called you back again.

It's time for you to do what you do best.

Super Hacker Girl is a retro-themed puzzle game where you must deploy your arsenal of hacking tools to maximum effect across 48 levels.
The game is played with mouse or touch control.

Made in 4 days for the Retroverse Jam #1 with the theme 'Chain Reaction'.

PLEASE NOTE: there is a bug on level C1 that renders it impossible to pass through standard means. We will fix it as soon as the jam judging is over!
